name: NoseGoes
0:
”Alexa, open nose goes”
”Alexa, start nose goes”
”Alexa, launch nose goes”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nose goes
des:
A trivia game to play with your echo button gadgets! Duke it out with up to four players and see who is the smartest of them all. The fastest person to hit the button and answer the most correct wins!

Activate the skill by saying "Alexa, start nose goes". Then respond to Alexa with how many players you want to quiz with! Alexa will then shoot out some trivia questions for you to answer. Alexa will provide a multiple choice set of answers. First person to hit the button first AND guess the correct answer wins the round.

Note: You can only have as many players as you have echo buttons.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
